sourcesContent:
Education

2018 - 2022

Bachelor's Degree
Bachelor of Business Information Technology.

Jomo Kenyatta University of Agriculture and Technology.

  • The institution aims at Information technology, software engineering and business environment .
  • With much enthusiasm, character, passion , grit and confidence got skills and expertise on Software development, Web development and Business Intelligence.

2013 - 2017

High School
High School

Salient High School

  • The High School was mainly focus on the bases of science, mathematics, and Chemistry
  • There was also a good base on physics, mathematics and chemistry langauges and discpline.
  • Completed my high school with a good grade that enhanced my chance to join JKUAT.

2004 - 2012

Primary School
Primary School

Matura Primary School

  • The Secondary aims at Maths , English , Science, Social Science, Litrature and Languages.
  • Completed my Secondary school with good grade and joined Passenga before Salient.
